<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="BaneLevel" type="Number">BaneLevel</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block inline="false" type="logic_binary_ops"><field type="math_singular_ops"><field name="OP">ROUND</field><value name="NUM"><block inline="false" type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><comment h="106" pinned="false" w="186">Damage + PEN
PEN= Def * (Lvl * 0.2
Lvl 1: 25% of Armor into Dmg
Lvl 2: 50% of Armor into Dmg
Lvl 3: 75% of Armor into Dmg</comment><value name="A"><block type="entity_armor_value"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.25</field></block></value><value name="B"><block inline="false" type="item_get_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:BaneofMetapod</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">CUSTOM:BaneofMetapodParticles</field><value name="count"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="false" is_player_var="false"/><field name="VAR">local:BaneLevel</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.6</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
